attributes.action: Enquire as to why social workers who visited BABY P no less than 60 times, failed to take the child into care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The very fact that social workers visited CHILD P no less than 60 times, points blatently to there being a severe problem.

Haringay social services should not be in charge of their own internal enquiry. YET AGAIN, HARINGAY HAVE FAILED TO STOP THE DEATH OF ANOTHER CHILD.

To say that nobody in social services is to blame, responsible, for this horrendous death of an innocent child is poppycock. HOW CAN THIS APPAULING ACT HAVE HAPPENED IN A SO CALLED CIVILISED COUNTRY.

60 VISITS...............THIS IS A SHAM, TOO LATE TO SAVE THIS LITTLE MITE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
